sections.heading: Short Title.258-1974-1 - Chapter 1 Department of Mental Health (330
sections.text:
This act shall be known and may be cited as the "mental health code".

History:1974, Act 258, Eff. Aug. 6, 1975Compiler's Notes:For renaming of the department of mental health to the department of community health, see E.R.O. No. 1996-1, compiled at MCL 330.3101 of the Michigan Compiled Laws.For creation of department of health and human services and abolishment of department of community health, see E.R.O. No. 2015-1, compiled at MCL 400.227.
